test_cases.Title: User Login Functionality_Mobile IOS_UAT_TEST_iOS_Testing login for mobile applications

Steps.Step Description: Open the mobile application on an iOS device.
Steps.Expected Result: The application launches successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Login' screen.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Login' screen is displayed with fields for email and password.

Steps.Step Description: Enter valid login credentials.
Steps.Expected Result: The input fields accept the credentials.

Steps.Step Description: Click the 'Login' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The system processes the login and displays the user's dashboard.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has a valid account and the application is installed.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid user credentials: email - user@example.com, password - Password123
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully logs into the application and is redirected to their dashboard.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers successful login only; does not verify session management.

test_cases.Title: Password Reset Verification_Mobile Android_UAT_TEST_Android_Check process for resetting password

Steps.Step Description: Open the mobile application on an Android device.
Steps.Expected Result: The application launches successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Forgot Password' page from the login screen.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Forgot Password' page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter the registered email address and submit the password reset request.
Steps.Expected Result: A message confirming that a password reset email has been sent is displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have a registered account with an accessible email.
test_cases.Expected Result: Password reset process is successfully triggered, confirming email sent.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers sending reset email only; does not include subsequent password change verification.

test_cases.Title: Login Functionality Validation_Backend_UAT_TEST_Backend_Validating login process for backend users

Steps.Step Description: Access the backend login page.
Steps.Expected Result: The backend login page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter valid administrative credentials and click 'Login'.
Steps.Expected Result: The system processes the credentials.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the administrator dashboard is displayed.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is logged in successfully to the administrator dashboard.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have administrative access and credentials.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid admin credentials: username - admin, password - AdminPass123
test_cases.Expected Result: Admin user logs in successfully and is taken to the administrator dashboard.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers login only; further functionality checks are outside this test.

test_cases.Title: SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto_001_REQUIREMENT_Organizzazione_TEST_Desktop_Verifying the organization and management of SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto

Steps.Step Description: Access the SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto official page.
Steps.Expected Result: The official SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Review the regulations regarding the organization and management.
Steps.Expected Result: The regulations for the organization, exercise and management of the special extraction of SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto are clearly presented.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is connected to the internet and has access to the official website.
test_cases.Expected Result: Regulations related to the organization of SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto are available and comprehensible.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the review of regulations; does not cover actual extraction processes.

test_cases.Title: Winning Combination Generation_001_SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto_TEST_Terminale_Check winning combination generation

Steps.Step Description: Access the gaming system via the terminal.
Steps.Expected Result: The gaming interface is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Request generation of a winning combination from the system.
Steps.Expected Result: The system generates and displays a winning combination of six random numbers between 1 and 90.

test_cases.Preconditions: The terminal is operational and connected to the gaming system.
test_cases.Expected Result: A valid winning combination is successfully generated.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the generation of winning combinations without other game-related functionalities.

test_cases.Title: Ticket Validation_002_SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto_TEST_Backoffice_Validate gaming ticket receipt

Steps.Step Description: Access the backoffice application.
Steps.Expected Result: The backoffice dashboard is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Input the validation criteria from a physical ticket receipt.
Steps.Expected Result: The system retrieves and displays the play details associated with the ticket receipt.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has valid access to the backoffice application.
test_cases.Expected Result: Ticket receipt is validated correctly with associated play details displayed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers validation of physical ticket receipts without addressing all ticketing processes.

test_cases.Title: Prize Information Display_003_SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto_TEST_Web_Retrieve prize information for specific draw

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the official website of the gaming system.
Steps.Expected Result: The homepage of the gaming website is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select the option to view prize information for a specific draw.
Steps.Expected Result: The prize information page for the selected draw is displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the internet.
test_cases.Expected Result: Correct prize information is displayed for the selected draw.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers retrieval of prize information for specific draws; does not include historical data retrieval.

test_cases.Title: User Login Functionality_001_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the application login page.
Steps.Expected Result: Login page is successfully displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter a valid username and password.
Steps.Expected Result: Username and password fields are correctly populated.

Steps.Step Description: Click the 'Login' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The user should be redirected to the dashboard.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have a valid account and be connected to the internet.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully logs in and is taken to the dashboard.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests the login process; does not verify session management.

test_cases.Title: Password Reset Functionality_002_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to 'Forgot Password' link on the login page.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Forgot Password' page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter the registered email address and submit the form.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation message indicates that an email has been sent.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have a registered email.
test_cases.Expected Result: Password reset email is sent successfully.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests the email sending functionality but does not verify the password change process.

test_cases.Title: Search Functionality_003_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Go to the application home page.
Steps.Expected Result: Home page is successfully displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter a query in the search bar and click 'Search'.
Steps.Expected Result: Search results relevant to the query are displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must be on the home page.
test_cases.Expected Result: Search results return relevant items based on the query.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates search function but not the sorting of results.

test_cases.Title: WinningNumbersExtraction_001_SiVinceTuttoSuperEnalotto_TEST_Web_extraction of winning numbers

Steps.Step Description: Access the SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto winning numbers extraction page.
Steps.Expected Result: The winning numbers extraction page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Extract Winning Numbers' button.
Steps.Expected Result: A new set of winning numbers is displayed to the user.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the displayed winning numbers are unique and range from 1 to 90.
Steps.Expected Result: Winning numbers are unique and within the range of 1 to 90.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the internet and the extraction page.
test_cases.Expected Result: Winning numbers are extracted according to the rules, fulfilling the requirement.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the extraction of winning numbers; does not cover the detailed probability calculations.

test_cases.Title: WinningPrizesCategories_002_SiVinceTuttoSuperEnalotto_TEST_Web_verifying prize categories

Steps.Step Description: Access the prize categories page for SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto.
Steps.Expected Result: The prize categories page is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Review the displayed prize categories and their corresponding points.
Steps.Expected Result: Prize categories match the expected configuration of first to fifth categories with points.

Steps.Step Description: Ensure that winning probabilities for each category are listed.
Steps.Expected Result: The probabilities for winning categories are accurately displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the internet and the prize categories page.
test_cases.Expected Result: Prize categories and probabilities are displayed correctly according to the requirements.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the display of categories; does not cover the actual calculation of winnings.

test_cases.Title: PostponedDrawsProcedure_003_SiVinceTuttoSuperEnalotto_TEST_Web_handling postponed draws

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the section that outlines procedures for postponed draws.
Steps.Expected Result: The relevant information regarding postponed draws is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the information includes how players are informed and refunds are processed.
Steps.Expected Result: The procedure for informing players and the refund process are clearly stated.

Steps.Step Description: Check for a time frame regarding refunds and cancellations.
Steps.Expected Result: The time frame is explicitly defined (refunds within 90 days of cancellation).

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the internet and the page describing postponed draws.
test_cases.Expected Result: All procedures for postponed draws including refunds are clearly stated as per requirements.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the procedure announcement for postponed draws; does not test the actual implementation of refunds.

test_cases.Title: Game Stake_001_GAME_Posta_TEST_Desktop_Verifying the game stake limit

Steps.Step Description: Open the game application.
Steps.Expected Result: The game application is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Check the value of the game stake.
Steps.Expected Result: The game stake displays 5.00 euros.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the game application.
test_cases.Expected Result: Game stake limit of 5.00 euros is correctly displayed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only validates the display of the stake; does not test stake adjustments.

test_cases.Title: Winning Distribution_002_GAME_WinningDistribution_TEST_Desktop_Verifying the winning distribution percentages

Steps.Step Description: Access the winning distribution settings.
Steps.Expected Result: Winning distribution settings are displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the percentage allocations for each winning category.
Steps.Expected Result: The percentages of winning categories are as follows: First category - 32.20%, Second category - 3.40%, Third category - 8.20%, Fourth category - 31.00%, Fifth category - 25.20%.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must be logged in as an administrator.
test_cases.Expected Result: Winning distribution percentages are displayed correctly.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Coverage only for predefined winning categories; dynamic changes not included.

test_cases.Title: Prize Redistribution_003_GAME_PrizeRedistribution_TEST_Desktop_Verifying redistribution when no winners exist

Steps.Step Description: Run a lottery draw with no winners.
Steps.Expected Result: The draw completes without any winners.

Steps.Step Description: Check the distribution of the prize pool.
Steps.Expected Result: The entire prize pool is distributed among all participants based on the number of played combinations.

test_cases.Preconditions: Lottery draw environment is set up without any winning entries.
test_cases.Expected Result: Prize pool distributed correctly among participants.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only checks redistribution mechanics with no winners.

test_cases.Title: Minimum Prize Check_004_GAME_MinimumPrize_TEST_Desktop_Verifying minimum prize conditions

Steps.Step Description: Access prize conditions for the fifth category.
Steps.Expected Result: Fifth category prize conditions are displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Verify if the prize for the fifth category is less than 5.00 euros.
Steps.Expected Result: If prize is less than 5.00 euros, checks if necessary funds are drawn from higher categories.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must be logged in with access to prize settings.
test_cases.Expected Result: Minimum prize integration functionality is verified correctly.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on checks for fifth category only.

test_cases.Title: Functionality_001_Desktop_UAT_Test_Performance_Verification

Steps.Step Description: Open the application on a desktop environment.
Steps.Expected Result: The application loads successfully without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the performance testing module.
Steps.Expected Result: The performance testing module is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Start a performance test using standard parameters.
Steps.Expected Result: The performance test begins executing without any issues.

Steps.Step Description: Monitor resource usage during the test.
Steps.Expected Result: Resource usage metrics are displayed in real-time.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the application and necessary permissions.
test_cases.Expected Result: Performance metrics are recorded accurately, and the application performs as expected under the load.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only tests basic performance metrics under standard load.

test_cases.Title: Functionality_002_Web_UAT_Test_Content_Validation

Steps.Step Description: Launch the web application in a browser.
Steps.Expected Result: The homepage of the application is displayed successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the specific content section to validate.
Steps.Expected Result: The content section loads without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that all textual content is accurately displayed.
Steps.Expected Result: All text content matches the predefined specifications.

Steps.Step Description: Check for the presence of images and videos in the content section.
Steps.Expected Result: All images and videos are displayed correctly and function as intended.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged into the system and has access to the content section.
test_cases.Expected Result: The content is accurate, complete, and depicted as specified in the content specifications document.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only textual and media content verification, excluding user interaction functionalities.

test_cases.Title: Participation_Simulation_001_PhysicalPoints_TEST_Mobile_Evaluating participation process at physical sales points

Steps.Step Description: Visit a physical sales point for the game.
Steps.Expected Result: The sales point is accessible and open for customers.

Steps.Step Description: Fill out a participation card or use a pre-filled or validated card.
Steps.Expected Result: Participation card is processed without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Interact with the operator by providing verbal game instructions.
Steps.Expected Result: The operator correctly records the game instructions.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is present at a physical sales point.
test_cases.Dataset: Participation card details, valid verbal instructions
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully participates in the game at the sales point.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the participation process at points of sale.

test_cases.Title: RemoteParticipation_002_DistanceGame_TEST_Desktop_Verifying the remote participation method

Steps.Step Description: Access the online platform for the game.
Steps.Expected Result: The game platform is correctly displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Login with valid user credentials.
Steps.Expected Result: User successfully logs in and is taken to the main game interface.

Steps.Step Description: Select participation options according to the provisions of article 24, comma 19, legge n. 88 del 2009.
Steps.Expected Result: Participation options are successfully selected and confirmed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has a registered online account.
test_cases.Expected Result: User participates in the game remotely according to legal provisions.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the remote participation method only; does not cover the legalities of the game.

test_cases.Title: Subscription_Plans_003_Subscription_Test_terminal_Checking subscription participation option at terminal

Steps.Step Description: Visit a gaming terminal that offers subscription options.
Steps.Expected Result: The terminal is operational and provides access to subscription features.

Steps.Step Description: Select the subscription plan option from the terminal menu.
Steps.Expected Result: Subscription plans are displayed correctly without glitches.

Steps.Step Description: Choose a suitable subscription plan and confirm the selection.
Steps.Expected Result: The subscription plan is successfully selected and confirmed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is at a gaming terminal with subscription capabilities.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully subscribes to a selected plan at the terminal.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the user experience and selection process for subscriptions.

test_cases.Title: Game Receipt Generation_001_GameParticipation_TEST_Terminale_Verifying receipt generation after a successful game transaction

Steps.Step Description: Access the gaming terminal and input valid game participation details.
Steps.Expected Result: The terminal processes the transaction and confirms registration.

Steps.Step Description: Wait for the terminal to print the game receipt.
Steps.Expected Result: A game receipt is printed with the appropriate details.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the gaming terminal and is a registered player.
test_cases.Expected Result: Game receipt is successfully printed and contains all necessary details.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the generation of receipts; does not test receipt content validation.

test_cases.Title: Receipt Content Verification_002_GameParticipation_TEST_Terminale_Verifying receipt contents after game transaction

Steps.Step Description: Obtain the printed game receipt after a successful game transaction.
Steps.Expected Result: The printed receipt is obtained.

Steps.Step Description: Check that the receipt contains the correct game combinations, control codes, and date of extraction.
Steps.Expected Result: All expected details match the provided transaction data.

Steps.Step Description: Ensure the receipt displays the correct identification codes for the point of sale and terminal.
Steps.Expected Result: Identification codes are correctly displayed on the receipt.

test_cases.Preconditions: The game transaction has been successfully completed and receipt generated.
test_cases.Dataset: Printed game receipt and transaction data
test_cases.Expected Result: The receipt displays all required data accurately.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: This test only covers printed receipt contents and not the backend data integrity.

test_cases.Title: Receipt Discrepancy Handling_003_GameParticipation_TEST_Terminale_Verifying player handling of receipt discrepancies

Steps.Step Description: Obtain a game receipt and identify intentional discrepancies in the displayed data.
Steps.Expected Result: Receipt is correctly acquired with known discrepancies.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to request an annulment of the receipt by providing it to the terminal operator.
Steps.Expected Result: An annulment request is submitted successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Confirm receipt annulment is processed by the terminal operator.
Steps.Expected Result: The annulment is authorized and confirmation of cancellation is given to the player.

test_cases.Preconditions: A receipt with known discrepancies has been printed.
test_cases.Expected Result: Receipt annulment process is initiated and managed correctly.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the annulment process; does not evaluate the underlying system checks for discrepancies.

test_cases.Title: SpecialGame_Taxonomy_001_Web_TEST_Desktop_Verifying the minimum cost of a ticket for special games

Steps.Step Description: Access the special game ticket purchasing page.
Steps.Expected Result: The special game ticket page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select the desired ticket quantity and observe the minimum price per ticket.
Steps.Expected Result: The minimum price of â‚¬5.00 is displayed per ticket.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to proceed with purchase without selecting a ticket.
Steps.Expected Result: An error message is displayed stating that at least one ticket must be selected.

Steps.Step Description: Select one ticket and complete the checkout process.
Steps.Expected Result: Purchase is successful and confirmation message is displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is registered and logged into the application.
test_cases.Expected Result: User can successfully verify ticket pricing and purchase a ticket.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: This test case covers the ticket pricing verification; refund and cancellation policies are not tested.

test_cases.Title: WinnerDistribution_Taxonomy_002_Web_TEST_Desktop_Verifying distribution of unclaimed winnings for special game tickets

Steps.Step Description: Initiate a draw for a special game.
Steps.Expected Result: The draw process initiates without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Check if any winning tickets are unclaimed at the draw closure.
Steps.Expected Result: Any unclaimed tickets are identified as winners.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the system's mechanism to redirect unclaimed winnings to charity.
Steps.Expected Result: Confirmation message is displayed indicating that unclaimed winnings will be routed to designated charitable organizations.

test_cases.Preconditions: The game has been drawn, and results are ready for review.
test_cases.Expected Result: All unclaimed winnings are allocated to charity as per the system's regulations.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: This test case focuses on unclaimed winnings; the process of winners claiming their prizes is not included.

test_cases.Title: Commission Control Verification_001_CONTROL_Commisioni_TEST_Desktop_verifying the regularity of extraction operations

Steps.Step Description: Access the control commission dashboard.
Steps.Expected Result: The dashboard is displayed with the list of all operations related to extraction.

Steps.Step Description: Select an operation to verify from the list.
Steps.Expected Result: The selected operation details are shown.

Steps.Step Description: Check for any irregularities in the selected operation.
Steps.Expected Result: The system indicates whether the operation is regular or irregular.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have permission to access the control commission dashboard.
test_cases.Dataset: No specific dataset required; any extraction operation can be used.
test_cases.Expected Result: The system successfully verifies the regularity of extraction operations.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates the interface for control commission but does not cover reporting functionalities.

test_cases.Title: Win Determination Control_002_CONTROL_Commisioni_TEST_Desktop_verifying the determination of winning operations

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the winning determination section of the dashboard.
Steps.Expected Result: The winning determination interface is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select a transaction to check for winning determination.
Steps.Expected Result: The transaction details and winning determination results are displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Review any irregularities in the determination process.
Steps.Expected Result: The system indicates if the determination process was followed correctly.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have access to the winning determination section.
test_cases.Expected Result: The system accurately determines and reports winnings without errors.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on the winning determination process without verifying calculation accuracy.

test_cases.Title: Commission Composition Verification_003_CONTROL_Commisioni_TEST_Desktop_verifying commission member presence

Steps.Step Description: Access the commission members list.
Steps.Expected Result: The list of commission members is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Confirm that at least two members are present in the commission.
Steps.Expected Result: The system confirms that the commission is properly constituted.

Steps.Step Description: Check the role of each member in the commission.
Steps.Expected Result: The roles of each member (President, Secretary, and others) are correctly displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have access rights to view commission member lists.
test_cases.Dataset: No specific dataset required; any commission can be utilized.
test_cases.Expected Result: The system accurately reflects the composition and roles of commission members.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests member presence but does not verify historical changes in commission makeup.

test_cases.Title: Compliance with Annex Specifications_004_CONTROL_Commisioni_TEST_Desktop_verifying compliance with regulations

Steps.Step Description: Review the annex guidelines related to commission operations.
Steps.Expected Result: The guidelines document is accessible and displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Check the operations conducted by the commission against the guidelines.
Steps.Expected Result: The system indicates compliance or any deviations from the guidelines.

Steps.Step Description: Generate a compliance report based on the findings.
Steps.Expected Result: A report is generated that summarizes the commission's compliance.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have permission to access the guidelines and generate reports.
test_cases.Dataset: No specific dataset required; compliance checks can use any operational data.
test_cases.Expected Result: The system successfully verifies compliance and generates a report.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only compliance verification and reporting functionalities.

test_cases.Title: Official Bulletin Publication_001_EU_Official Bulletin_TEST_Web_Scenario of publishing the official bulletin on the website

Steps.Step Description: Access the official website of the Concessionario.
Steps.Expected Result: The homepage of the Concessionario is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Locate and navigate to the section for the official bulletin.
Steps.Expected Result: The official bulletin section is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the official bulletin for the latest draw is published.
Steps.Expected Result: The latest official bulletin is visible and accessible.

test_cases.Preconditions: The official bulletin has been created and is available for publishing.
test_cases.Expected Result: The official bulletin for the latest draw is successfully published on the website.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only verifies the visibility of the official bulletin; does not test the content details.

test_cases.Title: Official Bulletin Content Verification_002_EU_Official Bulletin_TEST_Web_Verification of content in the official bulletin

Steps.Step Description: Access the official website and navigate to the official bulletin.
Steps.Expected Result: The official bulletin section is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Check for the presence of the winning combination in the official bulletin.
Steps.Expected Result: The winning combination is correctly listed in the bulletin.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the total prize amount mentioned in the bulletin.
Steps.Expected Result: The total prize amount matches the expected value.

Steps.Step Description: Confirm that the number of winning tickets and respective amounts are listed for each prize category.
Steps.Expected Result: The bulletin accurately reflects the number of winning tickets and amounts for each category.

Steps.Step Description: Check for the identification details of winning tickets.
Steps.Expected Result: The identifiers for winning tickets are accurately listed in the bulletin.

Steps.Step Description: Ensure the date on which the bulletin was created is visible.
Steps.Expected Result: The creation date of the official bulletin is correctly displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: The official bulletin has been published on the website.
test_cases.Dataset: Expected winning combination, prize amounts, ticket identifiers, bulletin date
test_cases.Expected Result: The contents of the official bulletin are accurately displayed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only verifies the content; does not test the actual calculation of winnings.

test_cases.Title: Physical Point Distribution_003_EU_Official Bulletin_TEST_Web_Distribution of the official bulletin to physical points

Steps.Step Description: Simulate the publication of the official bulletin.
Steps.Expected Result: The official bulletin is marked as published in the system.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the distribution process to each physical point of sale.
Steps.Expected Result: The system successfully records the distribution of the bulletin to all physical points.

Steps.Step Description: Check that the bulletin is displayed at each physical point of sale.
Steps.Expected Result: The official bulletin is visibly posted at all points of sale.

test_cases.Preconditions: The official bulletin should be published and ready for distribution.
test_cases.Expected Result: All physical points successfully display the published official bulletin.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: This does not cover verification of bulletin content at physical points.

test_cases.Title: User Registration_Mobile IOS_001_Application_TEST_iOS_verifying user registration functionality

Steps.Step Description: Open the application on an iOS device.
Steps.Expected Result: The application opens successfully without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Sign Up' page from the home screen.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Sign Up' page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Fill in the registration form with valid user information.
Steps.Expected Result: All fields are filled without validation errors.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the registration form.
Steps.Expected Result: The user receives a confirmation message that registration was successful.

test_cases.Preconditions: The application is installed and the device is connected to the internet.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid user information: name, email, password.
test_cases.Expected Result: User is registered successfully and receives a confirmation message.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers registration with valid data; error handling not included.

test_cases.Title: Login Functionality_Mobile Android_002_Application_TEST_Android_testing the login process

Steps.Step Description: Launch the application on an Android device.
Steps.Expected Result: The application opens successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the login screen.
Steps.Expected Result: The login screen is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter valid credentials and click the 'Login' button.
Steps.Expected Result: User is logged in successfully and redirected to the dashboard.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has a registered account and the application is installed.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully logs in and accesses the dashboard.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers login functionality only; session management not verified.

test_cases.Title: Password Recovery_Desktop_003_Web_TEST_Desktop_testing the password recovery process

Steps.Step Description: Open the web application on a desktop browser.
Steps.Expected Result: The web application loads without issues.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Forgot Password?' link.
Steps.Expected Result: User is redirected to the password recovery page.

Steps.Step Description: Enter the registered email address and submit.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation message indicates that a recovery email has been sent.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the internet and a registered account.
test_cases.Expected Result: Password recovery process initiated successfully.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers email submission; email delivery verification not included.

test_cases.Title: winnings_payment_001_Regulatory_PaymentProcedures_TEST_Desktop_Validating the payment procedures for winnings

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the payment of winnings is listed as the sole responsibility of the Concessionaire.
Steps.Expected Result: The statement indicating that the payment of winnings is solely the responsibility of the Concessionaire is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Check the procedures for payment of winnings below and above â‚¬1,000,000.
Steps.Expected Result: Payments of winnings below â‚¬1,000,000 are confirmed within 30 days, while amounts above are processed within 91 days.

test_cases.Preconditions: The user has access to the payment policy document from the Concessionaire.
test_cases.Expected Result: Payment procedures are accurately reflecting the regulations.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers payment timelines only; other detailed procedures are not addressed.

test_cases.Title: winnings_claim_submission_002_Regulatory_ReceiptVerification_TEST_Desktop_Verifying the receipt for winnings claims

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the payment claim section and attempt to submit a claim with a physical receipt.
Steps.Expected Result: The system accepts the claim submission with a physical receipt.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to submit a claim without a valid physical receipt.
Steps.Expected Result: The system displays an error message indicating that a valid receipt is required.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has a valid physical receipt for winnings.
test_cases.Expected Result: Valid receipts are accepted; invalid ones trigger error messages.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only the submission of physical receipts is covered; electronic receipt processing not included.

test_cases.Title: winnings_expiry_time_003_Regulatory_ReceiptExpiry_TEST_Desktop_Checking the expiry time for winnings receipts

Steps.Step Description: Submit a winning receipt for an amount below â‚¬20.
Steps.Expected Result: The system indicates that the receipt is valid for 6 months.

Steps.Step Description: Submit a winning receipt for an amount between â‚¬20.01 and â‚¬5,200.
Steps.Expected Result: The system indicates that the receipt is valid for 1 year.

Steps.Step Description: Submit a winning receipt for an amount above â‚¬5,200.
Steps.Expected Result: The system indicates that the receipt is valid for 2 years.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has different winning receipts for testing.
test_cases.Expected Result: Expiry periods are correctly validated for different winning amounts.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only covers receipts based on winning amounts; challenge cases not included.

test_cases.Title: Complaint Submission_001_LEGAL_Complaint Handling_TEST_Web_Desktop_Submitting a complaint regarding winnings

Steps.Step Description: Access the official complaints submission page on the website.
Steps.Expected Result: The complaints submission page is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Fill in the required fields for complaint submission, including player's information and complaint details.
Steps.Expected Result: All fields are filled successfully without validation errors.

Steps.Step Description: Attach a copy of the game receipt or identification data from an online play.
Steps.Expected Result: The file is successfully attached without any errors.

Steps.Step Description: Click the 'Submit Complaint' button.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation message is displayed indicating the complaint has been submitted.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has an account and is logged into the complaints submission system.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid player information and game receipt copy
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully submits a complaint, and confirmation is received.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the submission process; response handling not included.

test_cases.Title: Complaint Deadline_002_LEGAL_Complaint Handling_TEST_Web_Desktop_Verifying complaint submission within 60 days

Steps.Step Description: Access the official complaints submission page on the website.
Steps.Expected Result: The complaints submission page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to submit a complaint after the 60-day period from the publication of the official bulletin.
Steps.Expected Result: An error message indicating that the complaint cannot be submitted after the time limit is shown.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the complaints submission system.
test_cases.Expected Result: The system correctly prevents submission and displays an appropriate error message.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests time validation only; full complaint handling is not included.

test_cases.Title: Foreign Collection_001_Requirement_Raccolta del gioco allâ€™estero_TEST_Backend_verifying foreign collection assent from state

Steps.Step Description: Log in to the backend application as an admin.
Steps.Expected Result: The admin dashboard is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Foreign Collection Assents' section.
Steps.Expected Result: The foreign collection assents page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Check if there is an option to request assent from a foreign state.
Steps.Expected Result: The option to request assent is present and clickable.

Steps.Step Description: Submit a request for assent to collect SiVinceTutto SuperEnalotto in a foreign state.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation message appears indicating the request has been submitted.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged in as an admin with necessary permissions.
test_cases.Dataset: Information about the foreign state for assent request
test_cases.Expected Result: The request for assent is successfully submitted to the foreign state.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates the assent request process but does not include the actual response handling.

test_cases.Title: Foreign Collection_Negative Test_002_Requirement_Raccolta del gioco allâ€™estero_TEST_Backend_invalid assent request

Steps.Step Description: Log in to the backend application as an admin.
Steps.Expected Result: The admin dashboard is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Foreign Collection Assents' section.
Steps.Expected Result: The foreign collection assents page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to submit a request without providing necessary information.
Steps.Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating missing required fields.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged in as an admin.
test_cases.Expected Result: The system prevents submission and shows an error message.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates error handling for invalid assent requests.

test_cases.Title: mobileIOS_testGroup_001_Functionality_APP_TEST_iPhone_Testing mobile app functionality on iOS

Steps.Step Description: Install the mobile application from the App Store.
Steps.Expected Result: The application is successfully installed on the device.

Steps.Step Description: Open the mobile application.
Steps.Expected Result: The application launches without crashing and displays the home screen.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate through various sections of the app.
Steps.Expected Result: All sections are accessible and display the correct information.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has an iPhone with iOS 15 and internet connectivity.
test_cases.Expected Result: Mobile application functions correctly without errors.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers app navigation; not all features tested.

test_cases.Title: mobileAndroid_testGroup_002_Functionality_APP_TEST_Android_Testing Android app functionality

Steps.Step Description: Install the mobile application from Google Play Store.
Steps.Expected Result: The application is successfully installed on the Android device.

Steps.Step Description: Launch the mobile application.
Steps.Expected Result: The application opens successfully and presents the home screen to the user.

Steps.Step Description: Perform a login action and verify user credentials.
Steps.Expected Result: User is logged in successfully and the dashboard is displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has an Android device with version 11 and sufficient storage.
test_cases.Expected Result: Android application behaves as expected without crashing.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses only on login function; other features not covered.

test_cases.Title: appIOS_testGroup_003_Functionality_APP_TEST_iPad_Testing app functionality on iPad

Steps.Step Description: Download the application from the App Store on the iPad.
Steps.Expected Result: App is downloaded and installed successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Open the app and check for initial loading times.
Steps.Expected Result: App loads within acceptable time limits (less than 3 seconds).

Steps.Step Description: Interact with various features of the app.
Steps.Expected Result: All features respond correctly without any user interface glitches.

test_cases.Preconditions: User owns an iPad with a stable internet connection.
test_cases.Expected Result: App operates smoothly and flawlessly on the iPad.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Verifies loading and feature accessibility only; backend operations not tested.

test_cases.Title: Abrogation Application 001_Web_TEST_Desktop_Verifying the abrogation of previous regulations in application

Steps.Step Description: Access the regulatory web application and navigate to the abrogation section.
Steps.Expected Result: The abrogation section is displayed clearly with relevant regulations listed.

Steps.Step Description: Confirm the cessation of the previous decree n. 2011/39740/giochi/Ena.
Steps.Expected Result: The application should indicate that regulations based on decree n. 2011/39740/giochi/Ena are no longer in effect.

test_cases.Preconditions: The user is authorized and logged into the regulatory application.
test_cases.Dataset: User account with access to regulation services
test_cases.Expected Result: The application properly indicates the cessation of the previous regulations.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only tests the abrogation of specific previous regulations; does not cover all regulatory aspects.

test_cases.Title: Publication Confirmation 002_Web_TEST_Desktop_Verifying that the decree publication is accessible

Steps.Step Description: Go to the homepage of the regulatory application.
Steps.Expected Result: The homepage loads successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Locate the section for newly published decrees.
Steps.Expected Result: The section for newly published decrees is visible and accessible.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the link for the most recent decree published.
Steps.Expected Result: The details of the newly published decree load correctly.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is connected to the internet.
test_cases.Expected Result: User can successfully access the details of the newly published decree.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the visibility and accessibility of published decrees; does not cover the content verification.

test_cases.Title: Effective Date Verification 003_Web_TEST_Desktop_Verifying effective date after publication

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the published decree details page.
Steps.Expected Result: The published decree details page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Identify the effective date of the decree noted at the top or specified section.
Steps.Expected Result: The effective date is displayed correctly as the date of the first contest indicated.

test_cases.Preconditions: Decree has already been published and is accessible on the website.
test_cases.Dataset: Published decree on the regulatory portal
test_cases.Expected Result: The effective date of the document is displayed accurately.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers effective date display only; does not include date validation logic.

test_cases.Title: Document Review_XXX_VERIFICATION_Procedure_TEST_Desktop_Verifying document for legality and correctness

Steps.Step Description: Open the document containing 'IL VICEDIRETTORE' signature.
Steps.Expected Result: The document opens without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Locate the section with the signature of Alessandro Aronica.
Steps.Expected Result: The signature section is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the statement regarding the autographed signature replacement as per the law.
Steps.Expected Result: The statement matches the provided requirements in the document.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the document and a compatible PDF reader.
test_cases.Expected Result: All sections of the document are correct and conform to the specified requirements.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the verification of the signature section and legal statement.

test_cases.Title: Signature Validation_XXX_CHECK_Auth_TEST_Desktop_Verifying validity of signature and compliance

Steps.Step Description: Display the document for visual inspection.
Steps.Expected Result: The document is presented clearly on the screen.

Steps.Step Description: Check for any visible signs of tampering in the signature area.
Steps.Expected Result: No signs of tampering are found in the signature area.

Steps.Step Description: Validate that the signature complies with standard digital signature verification procedures.
Steps.Expected Result: The signature is verified as authentic and valid.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the document and a digital signature verification tool.
test_cases.Expected Result: Signature is validated successfully without issues.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses only on the signature verification process; does not include document content review.
